snippet: Grated butternut squash, browned sausage and caramelized onions add something special to a cozy bowl of polenta.
abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column features recipe for butternut squash polenta with sausage and onion.
lead_paragraph: Grated butternut squash, browned sausage and caramelized onions add something special to a cozy bowl of polenta.

headline.main: Polenta’s Journey From Fancy to Familiar
headline.print_headline: A Journey From Fancy to Familiar
